member.summary: Renders the control to the specified HTML writer.
member.param: The object that receives the control content.

member.summary: Renders the instance of ReportViewer.

member.summary: Loads the state of the view state.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.JavaScript.Web.ReportViewer.SaveViewState
member.summary: Saves any view-state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.
member.returns: The control's current view state. If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns null.

member.summary: Updates the server model.

member.summary: Gets or sets the ReportViewer model.

member.summary: Gets or sets the height.

member.summary: Gets or sets the width.

member.summary: Gets or sets the list of data sources for the RDLC report.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.JavaScript.Web.ReportViewer.Parameters
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of parameters associated with the report.

member.summary: Specifies the toolbar settings.

member.summary: Specifies the toolbar settings.

member.summary: Specifies the export settings.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.JavaScript.Web.ReportViewer.ReportServiceUrl
member.summary: Specifies the report Web API service url.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.JavaScript.Web.ReportViewer.ReportPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path of the report file.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.JavaScript.Web.ReportViewer.ReportServerUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the reports server URL.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.JavaScript.Web.ReportViewer.RenderMode
member.summary: Specifies the render layout.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.JavaScript.Web.ReportViewer.ProcessingMode
member.summary: Specifies the processing mode of the report.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.JavaScript.Web.ReportViewer.ZoomFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the zoom factor for report viewer.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.JavaScript.Web.ReportViewer.Locale
member.summary: Specifies the locale for report viewer.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.JavaScript.Web.ReportViewer.OnClientReportLoaded
member.summary: Fires when the report is loaded.If you want to perform any operation after the successful loading of report, you can make use of the reportLoaded event.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.JavaScript.Web.ReportViewer.OnClientReportError
member.summary: Fires when any error occurred while rendering the report.If you want to perform any operation when an error occurs in the report, you can make use of the reportError event.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.JavaScript.Web.ReportViewer.OnClientRenderingBegin
member.summary: Fires before report rendering is completed.If you want to perform any operation before the rendering of report,you can make use of the renderingBegin event.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.JavaScript.Web.ReportViewer.OnClientRenderingComplete
member.summary: Fires after report rendering completed.If you want to perform any operation after the rendering of report,you can make use of this renderingComplete event.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.JavaScript.Web.ReportViewer.OnClientDrillThrough
member.summary: Fires during drill through action done in report.If you want to perform any operation when a drill through action is performed, you can make use of the drillThrough event.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.JavaScript.Web.ReportViewer.OnClientViewReportClick
member.summary: Fires when click the ViewReport.If you want to modify the current parameter collection while viewReport click, you can make use of the viewReportClick event.
member.value: The on client view Report Click.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.JavaScript.Web.ReportViewer.OnClientDestroy
member.summary: Fires when the report viewer is destroyed successfully.If you want to perform any operation after destroying the reportviewer control,you can make use of the destroy event.
